title: What's New - Changelog Page
description: Introducing our beautiful new changelog page with an animated timeline, scroll-based reveals, and commit links. Track every update, improvement, and fix as we build in the open. See exactly what's changing and when.

title: Automatic Schedule Cleanup
description: Improved reliability with automatic cleanup of orphaned Temporal schedules. When tasks are deleted, their background monitoring schedules are now properly removed with comprehensive error handling.

title: Email & Webhook Notifications
description: Get notified when your monitoring conditions are met via email or webhook. Beautifully designed HTML emails with spam protection and automatic email verification through Clerk integration.

title: Mobile Scrolling Fixed
description: Fixed scrolling overflow issues in the task creation modal on mobile devices. Template selection and form inputs now work smoothly on smaller screens.

title: Modernized Task Creation UI
description: Completely redesigned the task creation interface with improved template selection, better visual hierarchy, icon-based template cards, and smoother animations. Creating monitoring tasks is now more intuitive and delightful.

title: Cloud SQL Proxy Reliability
description: Upgraded Cloud SQL Proxy to v2.19.0 with proper SIGTERM handling for graceful shutdowns. Includes quitquitquit endpoint support and optimized max-sigterm-delay configuration.

title: Registry Cache Fallback
description: Added registry cache fallback mechanism for better Docker layer reuse. Significantly improved build times and deployment reliability.

title: Unified Migration Architecture
description: Refactored database migrations to use consistent init container pattern across local and production environments. Improved reliability and simplified deployment process.

title: Admin Console
description: Added comprehensive admin dashboard for platform monitoring. Track users, executions, popular queries, Temporal workflows, and system errors all in one place.

title: Animated Landing Page
description: Enhanced the landing page with a beautiful animated network background featuring particles and connections. Includes parallax scrolling effects for a modern, dynamic first impression.

title: Production Authentication
description: Configured Clerk for production environment with proper OAuth flows and secure session management. Production-ready authentication is now live.

title: New Logo & Branding
description: Refreshed brand identity with a new logo design, updated favicon, and comprehensive brand pack. The new visual identity better represents Torale's modern, intelligent monitoring platform.

title: Temporal Cloud Integration
description: Configured Temporal UI to point to Temporal Cloud for production workflows. Enables easy monitoring and debugging of background task execution.

title: Dynamic Capacity Management
description: Implemented configurable user capacity limits with environment variable support. Allows flexible scaling control as the platform grows.

title: Social Sharing Optimization
description: Added OpenGraph meta tags for beautiful link previews when sharing Torale on social media platforms like Twitter, LinkedIn, and Slack.

title: Security: esbuild CVE Patch
description: Patched esbuild CORS vulnerability to enhance frontend security. Keeping dependencies up-to-date and secure.

title: CI/CD Layer Caching
description: Optimized CI/CD pipeline with Docker layer caching and integrated security scanning. Deployments are now significantly faster while maintaining security standards.

title: External Secret Management
description: Removed Helm secrets template to enforce external secret management best practices. Secrets are now managed securely outside version control.

title: Native GitHub Actions Cache
description: Migrated to Docker's native GitHub Actions cache backend for simpler and more reliable build caching. Reduced manual cache management complexity.

title: Simplified GKE Authentication
description: Refactored GKE authentication to use get-gke-credentials action for simpler, more secure cluster access. Includes gke-gcloud-auth-plugin for kubectl compatibility.

title: Helmfile v2 Integration
description: Upgraded to helmfile-action v2 with integrated Helm and plugins. Streamlined deployment process with better dependency management.

title: GCP Kubernetes CI/CD
description: Set up complete CI/CD pipeline for GCP Kubernetes deployments with automated builds, security scanning, and multi-environment support. Production deployments are now fully automated.

title: Task Templates
description: Choose from pre-built monitoring templates like Product Release Tracker, Price Monitoring, and Availability Alerts. Get started faster with smart defaults and auto-filled configurations for common use cases.

title: Modern Landing Page
description: Launched a beautiful new landing page with scroll animations, clear use cases, and a modern design. Now it's easier than ever to understand what Torale does and get started.
